channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Elder (BD Social) and The Hag (Unseen Social)
channel.description:
># [color=ligblue]The Elder[/color] >**[color=ligblue]Blue Dragon Social[/color]** > >**Unique** > >**Passive (Herbal Wisdom) ~ Immune to Bleeding and Nightshade. You will keep this Passive, even if your Class Changes.** >**Passive 2 (Around the Town) ~ Sees all day abilities being performed (Doesn't see who used them), Does not see abilities used by neutrals.** > >**Day Ability (Meditation) ~ Make yourself conversion immune for the night. You cannot use any night abilities tonight. (2 uses)** > >**Night Ability (Inform) ~ You and Target Player Will Know the Identity of One Person Visiting The Target Tonight. (Infinite Uses)** >**Night Ability (Communications) ~ Have 2 players see each other's feedback from abilities used last night. Does not show attacks or conversion. (2 uses)** > > **Goal: Defeat the Cult/Unseen and any Neutrals who seek to do you harm.**
># [color=purple]The Hag[/color] >**[color=purple]Unseen Social[/color]** > >**Unique** > >**Passive (Herbal Wisdom) ~ Immune to Bleeding and Nightshade. You will keep this Passive, even if your Class Changes.** >**Passive (Keen Ears) ~ See all day abilities being performed (Does see who used them), Does not see abilities used by neutrals.** > >**Day Ability (Nosy) ~ Listen in on the Prince tonight. (2 uses)** >**Day Ability 2 (Invoke) ~ Disable Target's Passives For Current Day and Night. Can be Used During The King's Election Phase. Target Will Not Receive A Notification. Does not remove death and conversion immunity. (3 uses)** > >**Night Ability (Educate) ~ Target Unseen Member Will Know the Identity of all Players Visiting Them. (3 Uses)** >**Night Ability 2 (Astonish) ~ Frame Target and Receive the Feedback of the Ability the Target Used Last Night. (Infinite Uses)** > >**Goal: Defeat the Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek to do you harm.**
># [color=grey]Clarifications[/color] >~ **For Invoke, it removes the target's passives for the day used and the following night. So if it was used Day 5, it would work from Day 5 to the end of Night 5.** >~ **For Nosy, it does not give away who the Prince/Jailed are, it would show something like this. Prince: Class? Jailed: I am a Noble.** >~ **For Around The Town, it would show something like this. A Noble or Aristocrat forced [15] to vote for [6]. For Keen Ears, it would show something like this. [7] forced [15] to vote for [6].**
I'd love to hear some feedback, as this is a raw idea. Thanks!

I could make an exception for abilities like Troll box. It would kill the fool and scorned’s win chances.

item.source: [Class Suggestion] The Elder (BD Social) and The Hag (Unseen Social)

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Elder (BD Social) and The Hag (Unseen Social)
item.dc:creator: Mercenary_Central
item.description:
The Elder

Blue Dragon Social

Unique

Passive (Herbal Wisdom) ~ Immune to Bleeding and Nightshade. You will keep this Passive, even if your Class Changes.
Passive 2 (Around the Town) ~ Sees all day abilities being performed (Doesn’t see who used them), Does not see abilities used by neutrals.

Day Ability (Meditation) ~ Make yourself conversion immune for the night. You cannot use any night abilities tonight. (2 uses)

Night Ability (Inform) ~ You and Target Player Will Know the Identity of One Person Visiting The Target Tonight. (Infinite Uses)
Night Ability (Communications) ~ Have 2 players see each other’s feedback from abilities used last night. Does not show attacks or conversion. (2 uses)

Goal: Defeat the Cult/Unseen and any Neutrals who seek to do you harm.

The Hag

Unseen Social

Unique

Passive (Herbal Wisdom) ~ Immune to Bleeding and Nightshade. You will keep this Passive, even if your Class Changes.
Passive (Keen Ears) ~ See all day abilities being performed (Does see who used them), Does not see abilities used by neutrals.

Day Ability (Nosy) ~ Listen in on the Prince tonight. (2 uses)
Day Ability 2 (Invoke) ~ Disable Target’s Passives For Current Day and Night. Can be Used During The King’s Election Phase. Target Will Not Receive A Notification. Does not remove death and conversion immunity. (3 uses)

Night Ability (Educate) ~ Target Unseen Member Will Know the Identity of all Players Visiting Them. (3 Uses)
Night Ability 2 (Astonish) ~ Frame Target and Receive the Feedback of the Ability the Target Used Last Night. (Infinite Uses)

Goal: Defeat the Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek to do you harm.

Clarifications

~ For Invoke, it removes the target’s passives for the day used and the following night. So if it was used Day 5, it would work from Day 5 to the end of Night 5.
~ For Nosy, it does not give away who the Prince/Jailed are, it would show something like this.
Prince: Class?
Jailed: I am a Noble.
~ For Around The Town, it would show something like this.
A Noble or Aristocrat forced [15] to vote for [6].
For Keen Ears, it would show something like this.
[7] forced [15] to vote for [6].

I’d love to hear some feedback, as this is a raw idea. Thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: [Class Suggestion] The Elder (BD Social) and The Hag (Unseen Social)
